segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are engaged in a rather precarious operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, I see it's a cookie jar, full of delicious treats!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks incredibly unstable, it's tilting quite a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to fall backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s quite a daring feat they’re attempting, right under the adult's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs of the stool are splayed out, making it look so wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely pushing their luck with this little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without any tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their focused determination is almost admirable in its mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic childhood conspiracy playing out before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
